metadata.title: CVE-2020-26571 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
The gemsafe GPK smart card software driver in OpenSC before 0.21.0-rc1 hasa stack-based buffer overflow in sc_pkcs15emu_gemsafeGPK_init.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.21.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.21.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.21.0-1').
